name: WP01 – Speed, Security, SEO consultant
author: WP01

sections.description:
Plugin for self-acceleration, SEO optimization and protection of your WordPress site.
Created by the team “WP01” working in the field of protection, acceleration, SEO system WordPress.
There are no restrictions – the WP01 plugin is 100% free!

WP01 – for those who want to make their site better!

DEMO: https://demo.wp01.ru

Opportunities:

  • Display of technical data (PHP/WP/MySQL, RAM…)
  • Detailed instructions for creating an FTP / MySQL backup
  • A set of plugins and manual implementations to speed up the site
  • Anti-spam and anti-hacking tools
  • Everything for preparing a project for SEO
  • Tools for comfortable implementation of improvements

Conveniences:

  • Managing (installing, activating/deactivating) plugins
  • The best analogues of the recommended tools
  • Replacing plugins with code
  • Intuitive easy operation
  • Tips, statuses/tasks/importance, help and clarification of works
  • Detailed instructions for each tool (in operation)

Detailed overview of the WP01 plugin

Language

  • Russian
  • English
sections.installation:
For automatic installation:
go to the WordPress admin panel under “Plugins” – > “Add New”, then type ” WP01 “and click”Install”.

Manual installation is also very easy:
1. Download the zip archive from the site and unzip it
2. Upload the “wp01” plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins” directory/”
3. Activate the plugin via the Plugins menu in WordPress
4. Select “Improvements from WP01” in the panel and make the necessary improvements to your site!
sections.faq:
What is “WP01” for?

The plugin allows you to help speed up your site in a clear way, make it more secure (from spam, viruses and external attacks) and prepare for SEO optimization.

Are all the improvements listed in the plugin?

No, but we’re working on it! In each new version, we will talk about new optimizations that we have thoroughly tested on our projects. Be patient!

Do you still have questions?

Write to us at support@wp01.ru

1.0
